repositories.author: RT-Thread

repositories.author: taosdata
repositories.name: TDengine
repositories.description: High-performance, scalable time-series database designed for Industrial IoT (IIoT) scenarios

repositories.author: curl
repositories.name: curl
repositories.description: A command line tool and library for transferring data with URL syntax, supporting DICT, FILE, FTP, FTPS, GOPHER, GOPHERS, HTTP, HTTPS, IMAP, IMAPS, LDAP, LDAPS, MQTT, POP3, POP3S, RTMP, RTMPS, RTSP, SCP, SFTP, SMB, SMBS, SMTP, SMTPS, TELNET, TFTP, WS and WSS. libcurl offers a myriad of powerful features

repositories.author: nanopb
repositories.name: nanopb
repositories.description: Protocol Buffers with small code size

repositories.author: olikraus
repositories.name: u8g2
repositories.description: U8glib library for monochrome displays, version 2

repositories.author: wolfSSL
repositories.name: wolfssl
repositories.description: The wolfSSL library is a small, fast, portable implementation of TLS/SSL for embedded devices to the cloud. wolfSSL supports up to TLS 1.3 and DTLS 1.3!

repositories.author: DaveGamble
repositories.name: cJSON
repositories.description: Ultralightweight JSON parser in ANSI C

repositories.author: Mbed-TLS
repositories.name: mbedtls
repositories.description: An open source, portable, easy to use, readable and flexible TLS library, and reference implementation of the PSA Cryptography API. Releases are on a varying cadence, typically around 3 - 6 months between releases.

repositories.author: pnggroup
repositories.name: libpng
repositories.description: LIBPNG: Portable Network Graphics support, official libpng repository

repositories.description: Embedded web server, with TCP/IP network stack, MQTT and Websocket

repositories.author: zephyrproject-rtos

repositories.description: Primary Git Repository for the Zephyr Project. Zephyr is a new generation, scalable, optimized, secure RTOS for multiple hardware architectures.

repositories.author: OpenMathLib
